* Brand: HP
* Make : 530
* Model: KD089AA, GH641AT, GN797AA
=== Current Issues ===
''Arthur Archnix:''
* Correct resolution and speaker mute on jack insert do not work from fresh install.
* Sound does not *seem to* work from fresh install when dual booting. See notes.
* Video playback from mplayer and totem seems not to work. See notes.

''PavelŠefránek:''
* Speaker mute on jack insert (<nowiki>[[https://bugzilla.novell.com/show_bug.cgi?id=337409|#337409]]</nowiki>). ''I'm gonna file this against ubuntu bugzilla.''
* Hibernation and lid close detection do not work
* This laptop suffers from <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/acpi-support/+bug/59695|Laptop Hardrive Killer Bug]]</nowiki>, see <nowiki>[[http://ubuntudemon.wordpress.com/2007/10/26/laptop-hardrive-killer-bug/]]</nowiki> for details

==== Notes ====
This only applies to the model owned by Arthur Archnix:
* If sound does not work from fresh install (in a dual-boot scenario with Windows):
  Restart, enter bios (F10), reset to defaults, apply changes (F10), save and exit (F10).
* Video playback seemes not working due to some XVideo issue. A workaround is to disable XVideo support by inserting the following line in the video card section of xorg.conf:
  Option "XVideo" "false"
